text: Simonetta Myriam Sommaruga (born 14 May 1960) is a Swiss politician. She is a member of the Social Democratic Party. Sommaurga was a member of the Swiss Federal Council from 2010 to 2022. She was Vice President of the Federal Council for the year 2014. In 2015 and 2020, she was President of the Swiss Confederation. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Swiss Confederation Category:Members of the Federal Council (Switzerland) Category:People from Zug
title: Simonetta Sommaruga
